trans-unit.source: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
trans-unit.target: Chega a comprender ben métricas importantes sobre a tú clientela empregando Google Analytics

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to uninstall Google Analytics? You will lose all the data related to this module.
trans-unit.target: Estás segura de querer desinstalar Google Analytics? Perderás tódolos datos relacionados con este módulo.
Actualizada correctamente a ID da Conta

trans-unit.source: Settings for User ID updated successfully
trans-unit.target: A configuración da ID de Usuario actualizouse correctamente

trans-unit.source: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics.
trans-unit.target: A túa clientela vai a todas partes; as túas analíticas non deberían.

trans-unit.source: Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tables and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.
trans-unit.target: Google Analytics móstrache un perfil completo da clienta a través de anuncios, vídeos, sitios web e ferramentas sociais, táboas e teléfonos intelixentes. Isto fai máis doado servir ás túas clientas actuais e conseguir outras novas.

trans-unit.source: With ecommerce functionality in Google Analytics you can gain clear insight into important metrics about shopper behavior and conversion, including:
trans-unit.target: Coa funcionalidade de comercio electrónico en Google Analytics podes chegar a comprender métricas importantes sobre o comportamento da compradora e a conversión, incluíndo:
O proceso de verificación e pagamento

trans-unit.source: Merchants are able to understand how far along users get in the buying process and where they are dropping off.
trans-unit.target: As comerciantes son capaces de comprender cómo de lonxe chegaron as usuarias no proceso de compra e onde o están deixando.

trans-unit.source: Create your account to get started.
trans-unit.target: Crea a túa conta para comezar.
